headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Biker discounts and Double RP on Clubhouse Contracts through May 15th
content:
Through May 15th, Motorcycle Clubs of Los Santos will benefit from a GTA$ & RP boost when running Biker Contract Missions plus there’s a 25% discount on:

• Biker Clubhouses
• Biker Clubhouse Customizations
• Biker Business Properties
• Nagasaki Shotaro
• Progen T20
• Western Company Annihilator
• Karin Technical

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
